citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 3/26/15 at 2:00 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Upon arrival at the facility licensee stated that they had a prior commitment and would not be able to do an on
site inspection. I did go over the hours of availability to do a facility inspection that the licensee had given with the
licensee.
* Copy of the inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 3/26/15 at  2:00 PM to do a facility inspection.
*   Upon arrival at the facility licensee stated that they had a prior commitment and would not be able to do an on
site inspection.  I did go over the hours of availability to do a facility inspection that the licensee had given with the
licensee.
*  Copy of the inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
